description: Selling my travel buddy for the last 4.5 years due to upgrade. Urgent. Honda ES8 2002/2004. Leather interior. Original Honda carpets. Full option. In good condition. Accident free vehicle. Fuel: 10-11km/l in city and 14-15km/l in highway & outstation. Can be inspected in Panadura. Inspection can be arranged in Colombo on weekdays. Price negotiable.
name: Honda Civic  2002
